additional_info:
Storeroom, Wardrobe, Telephone, Satellite, Alarm System, Window guards, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 Sold in Tabakhmela 4 bedroom single-storey 150 sq. m. house at 400. sq m of land area, 12.5 miles from Liberty Square. Clean air, permanent water, natural gas well
Dining room with fireplace, three bedrooms, garage, two bathrooms, a wardrobe and a built-in cupboards, house renovated and provided with all the terms and conditions (heat, hot water, etc.), the window of the kitchen and rest rooms overlook the courtyard.
